snippet: College graduates and dropouts alike are adding to their formal educations with vocational training offered by commercial brands.
abstract: College graduates and dropouts alike are adding to their formal educations with vocational training offered by commercial brands, like Goggle and Red Bull; members of traditional academia say the rise of such untraditional vocational institutions is understandable, given the constantly touted can-do possibilities of the Web combined with the deluge of depressing news about college debt and high unemployment numbers.
lead_paragraph: College graduates and dropouts alike are adding to their formal educations with vocational training offered by commercial brands.

headline.main: Vocational Training From a Label Near You
headline.print_headline: Vocational Training From a Label Near You
